DTSB01H3.title: DTSB01H3  Introduction to Diaspora and Transnational Studies I
DTSB01H3.description: An interdisciplinary introduction to the study of diaspora, with particular attention to questions of history, globalization, cultural production and the creative imagination. Material will be drawn from Toronto as well as from diasporic communities in other times and places.

DTSB02H3.title: DTSB02H3  Introduction to Diaspora and Transnational Studies II
DTSB02H3.description: A continuation of DTSB01H3. An interdisciplinary introduction to the study of diaspora, with particular attention to questions of history, globalization, cultural production and the creative imagination. Material will be drawn from Toronto as well as from diasporic communities in other times and places.

prerequisite.str: It is recommended that DTSB01H3 and DTSB02H3 be taken in the same academic year.
